articles.title: Never Have I Ever season 3 brings the biggest drama yet: a real relationship - Polygon
articles.description: Mindy Kaling’s Never Have I Ever returns to Netflix for season 3 on Aug. 12. Maitreyi Ramakrishnan stars as Devi, who is finally dating her dream boy, Paxton Hall-Yoshida.

articles.title: Brad Pitt is dating! The actor, 58, is 'seeing someone' SIX years after splitting from Jolie - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 58-year-old Bullet Train actor has been seeing a new woman, but is not in a 'serious' relationship, a source told People on Wednesday. He split from Jolie six years ago.
